basic.description: This six-week graduate module provides students with background in physical polymer science as it relates to the formulation of materials to satisfy engineering applications.  Starting from the characterization of molecular weight and composition distributions, the fundamentals of phase transitions, solubility, adhesion and thermo-oxidative stabilization are discussed. Offered jointly with CHEE 490; S. Parent.
basic.subject: CHEE
basic.title: Structure-Property Relationships of Polymeric Materials
